component: flex flex-col items-center bg-white p-2 w-[80%]
nameFieldSet: flex flex-col w-full space-x-2 items-center justify-start
nameInput: border-2 border-black border-solid w-[80%] p-1 md:w-[50%]
generalSection: flex w-full flex-wrap flex-col items-center gap-y-8 justify-self-center md:flex-row md:items-start md:justify-around
generalDiv: flex flex-wrap w-[48%] gap-x-3 justify-center bg-slate-300 rounded-xl p-2
aScoreSection: flex w-full flex-wrap flex-col items-center gap-y-8 justify-self-center md:items-start md:justify-around md:flex-row
aScoreStats: flex flex-col items-center gap-y-4 w-full bg-slate-300 rounded-xl py-8
statsDiv: flex justify-around items-center gap-y-4 gap-x-2 w-full bg-slate-300 rounded-xl flex-wrap xl:flex-nowrap
statsMainInput: border-2 border-black border-solid w-24 h-24 rounded-md text-center pb-2 font-semibold text-2xl
statsSubInput: border-2 border-black border-solid absolute w-12 h-8 rounded-xl top-24 text-center text-md font-medium
aScoreOthers: flex gap-y-4 w-full bg-slate-300 rounded-xl py-4 px-3 justify-center items-center gap-x-1 flex-wrap xl:justify-center
aSOthersFieldSet: flex flex-col w-[49%] md:w-[15%] relative justify-center items-center
aSOthersInput: border-2 border-black border-solid w-16 h-8 rounded-md text-center p-1 font-normal text-xl
aScoreSaves: flex flex-col items-center px-3 gap-y-4 w-full bg-slate-300 rounded-xl py-4 justify-center flex-wrap md:flex-row
statSavesFieldSet: flex justify-center items-center w-[90%] gap-x-2 md:w-[32%]
statSavesInput: border-2 border-black border-solid w-16 h-8 rounded-md text-center p-1 font-normal text-xl md:w-[25%]
statSavesCheckBox: border-2 border-black border-solid w-[10%] h-4 text-center p-1 font-normal text-xl
aScoreSkills: flex flex-col items-center px-3 gap-y-4 w-full bg-slate-300 rounded-xl py-4 justify-start flex-wrap md:flex-row
skillsFieldSet: flex items-center w-full gap-x-1 md:w-[48%] xl:justify-center
skillsInput: border-2 border-black border-solid w-12 h-8 rounded-md text-center p-1 font-normal text-xl md:w-[25%]
skillsCheckBox: border-2 border-black border-solid w-[10%] h-4 text-center p-1 font-normal text-xl
subTitle: font-black text-xl w-full text-center
eAndMSection: flex w-full flex-wrap flex-col items-center h-max gap-y-8 justify-self-center relative md:items-start md:justify-around md:flex-row
moneyDiv: flex flex-wrap justify-center items-center self-center gap-y-2 gap-x-2 w-full p-1 bg-slate-300 rounded-xl md:w-[25%] md:flex-col
moneyInput: border-2 border-black border-solid w-12 h-9 rounded-xl text-center p-1 font-medium text-sm
equipmentFieldSet: flex justify-center h-96 w-full p-1 md:w-[75%]
equipmentTextArea: border-2 border-solid border-black rounded-md resize-none min-h-full overflow-y-auto table-scroll w-full p-2 font-normal text-wrap text-sm md:text-base md:w-[80%]
